website_summaries.verdict: Dogs with sensitive stomachs will love this gentle, easy-to-digest food.
pros: Free of corn, wheat, gluten and soy
High protein, low-carb formula is easy to digest
Suitable for dogs in all stages of life
cons: Dog food bag is not resealable, making it harder to keep fresh

customer_reviews.title: Important tip
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 month GSD and have tried many different brands: Blue Wilderness, Purina, Iam’s, Grandma Mae’s. This one is a winner. Just look at the ingredients and analysis: 38% protein, 18% fat, 90% of protein comes from actual meat and not peas. If there’s one thing I know my pup loves, it’s meat. Tip: if you buy in bulk, more than 5 lbs bags, learn how to properly store kibble because they do go stale. Victor does not come in resealable bags so please store in a proper airtight container.
customer_reviews.author: Tony P.

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves this
customer_reviews.text: Our farm friend highly recommended this kibble for our new puppy. He inhails it and eagerly come and sits for us as we offer it as treats too. The ingredients look clean and wholesome. Poops are consistent and healthy looking. So while this is expensive and hard to find (I can’t find this anywhere locally) I’m going to stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: Angoraknitter

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive tummies
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 large bags of this stuff and although I have one dog with a sensitive stomach, one dog with an iron gut... this stuff has both of my dogs vomiting. I switched foods and it stopped. Wondering if it was a stomach bug and because I have 2 bags of this stuff, I reintroduced to my dogs again. Both began committing again. There is one of the higher priced Victor foods they both love and I had no issues with. But this one made my boys sick ;(
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny, best dog food ever.
customer_reviews.text: My 3yr old German Shepherd has always had skin issues. I tried all kinds of dog food and medicines to help with his allergies, but nothing seemed to work. I’m so glad I stumbled on this brand of dog food, I am beyond impressed with the results. My dog is no longer taking medication, his coat isn’t shedding as much, it’s shiny and very soft, and best of all my dog isn’t uncomfortable anymore. It’s definitely worth every penny, best dog food ever. I will not buy from a different brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Spenser Eden Guest

customer_reviews.title: Gave my dogs gas
customer_reviews.text: While I was happy with the price of this food and each of my 5 dogs liked eating it, I was unhappy about the truely horrible gas it gave my dogs. My dogs had gas so bad that I would have to check and make sure they didn't have a accident in the house. The odor would linger for hours that's how bad it was. I had initially hoped that this high protein food would help 2 of my pups put on a few extra pounds, which it didn't seem to help with weight gain.
customer_reviews.author: E. Treasure

customer_reviews.title: Great food for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used to feed some higher quality foods but due to acquiring another large dog I had to move to a cheaper food. Victor is incredible quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A. A.

customer_reviews.title: I started the puppy on this because this is what ...
customer_reviews.text: I started the puppy on this because this is what she had been eating when I picked her up. She loves this and it definitely sits well with her.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Good solid poops
customer_reviews.text: Switched from Rachel ray and now my dog has solid poops. I would recommend paying the little bit extra so I don’t have to pick up runny poops in my backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Boss

customer_reviews.title: Stay far, far away -- "Blood Meal" now the second biggest ingriedient
customer_reviews.text: All you need to do is a quick google search to learn more about blood meal and its effect on Dogs. Victor quietly replaced good ole fashioned meat with a disgusting, dangerous, and potentially toxic blood meal. Sure, its cheaper and helps their bottom line -- but do not give this to your pup.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: German Shepard Puppy Likes It.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good product. Puppy eats every bit of this food. Stools are quite small and very dark color. Seems that what is eaten is effectively put to use by puppy. Some reviewers have commented that stools had very unpleasant odor. Yes, I would agree but so what? It is stool. Will likely continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HenryR

customer_reviews.title: Good company, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Victor is a good company. But one of my dogs got very sick on this food - vomiting and diarrhea every 20 minstrel around the clock. I stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: The Lilac Poet

customer_reviews.title: Great food great price
customer_reviews.text: My guys are really doing well on this food. The puppy had stomach problems with last food. The older dog was so fussy! Finally found something he will eat!! Only thing I wish it had glucosamie in it. I have to supplement that. Very good food for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: maureen fisher

customer_reviews.title: Quality dog food
customer_reviews.text: I have my 10 week old GSD/Heeler pup on this until I can start her on a nutritionally balanced raw diet. She has tolerated this formula quite well and is thriving. While I'm not a huge fan of kibble, this is the highest quality I've been able to find that my pup likes. If you love your pet, don't feed them crap kibble.
customer_reviews.author: @battleborndiy

customer_reviews.title: Awful product for you pet!
customer_reviews.text: Awful product! I was looking for a lower carb food without completely going keto for my Shiba Inu that recently had a seizure. It was recommended on several reputable websites. It made my dog extremely sick and I was only mixing a small amount with her current food. Can't imagine if I gave her a full serving. I started really reading the reviews not just the total rating...now I see it's a recurring problem with this brand. Don't buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve P.

customer_reviews.title: Read through the ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this dog food based on positive reviews and Value. My dog did like the food, but immediately vomited a couple times after eating. Concerned about the ingredients, specifically "Blood Meal" (Google - originally used for fertilizer)
customer_reviews.author: E Family #1

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this dog food
customer_reviews.text: I don’t actually know what the flavor is like. I’ve never tried it. But my dog is happy to eat it and it seems to really agree with him. When he was on Ian’s or Purina, his stools were loose and messy. Since switching to this, they are solid and don’t have such a nasty smell. Easy to clean up. He is a 1.5 year old black lab and has been on Nutra Pro for almost one year now.
customer_reviews.author: ks

customer_reviews.title: May cause hot spots
customer_reviews.text: Only kibble that has given a dog of ours "hot spots". Once we stopped feeding this the hot spots cleared up within 24 hours. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dog food
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality dog food. All 4 dogs like it and I know they are getting good nutrition. 4 stars because the price is high but that's the price for premium food.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSAR

customer_reviews.title: So glad I gave Victor Nutra Pro a try.  Wish I had known about it & tried it sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about buying this product because of the comments on the smell. But come to find, there was nothing offensive or foul smelling about it; even after adding warm water to it. My Jack Russell Terriers were on a grain free dog food regimen. Hearing about the heart problem scare with feeding dogs a grain free diet, I decided to switch to a food with grain. After much, much research & comparison I decided to go with Victor Dog Food. My dogs absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry D Lawrence Sr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for GSD
customer_reviews.text: Our German Shepherd was a rescue and very under weight with a coarse coat. After two months on this food, her weight is up, her coat is full and shiny, and she is full of energy. Her stool is firm on this food too unlike the runny stool on her other food. Side note - I gave "flavor" five stars but who can actually vouch for that one?...
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Hands down a perfect food.
customer_reviews.text: Great food! Works for all 3 of my dogs and 2 have sensitive stomachs. 1 is a working service dog who is also training for sports. At 14 months old, (Golden Retriever) you can see a great muscle structure as well.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great food and even better prices
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food and does very well. It makes her coat softer and poops are firm.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Bedard

customer_reviews.title: Tastiest food according to our dog
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this food so much we now have to slow him down lest he get sick from eating too fast. Also like the smaller portions than other good brands.
customer_reviews.author: Saaz T.

customer_reviews.title: The protein intake was excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I wish that instead of a 40lb bag they would have a 50lb bag.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Use caution! Very rich and makes dog gassy.
customer_reviews.text: I gradually started my two dogs on this. Fully changed over after about a week. My dogs have fairly hardy stomachs but once fully on victor. Both my dogs had extreme black diarrhea. Actually think it may have a factor in causing bloat in our. one dog. Both my dogs did enjoy the food but I think it was too rich and gassy for my pups.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Lallaman

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like it.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my puppy not only did I have to feed way more of this food but she also went to the bathroom 8 times once i switched to another food went down to 2 to 3 times a day. Was hopeful this food would have worked because of the price but because having to feed more didn’t make the difference buying the more expensive food.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Moayer

customer_reviews.title: Caused diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: This is simply the worst food I have ever fed my dogs. I’ve been feeding it to them for 5+ months and I switched it very slowly. My dogs have had diarrhea off and on since the month after I switched. After trial and error turns out it’s this food.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hood

customer_reviews.title: Bag has a small tear
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon box was fine but the bag came with a small tear at the bottom and now I’m unsure of how fresh it is for my puppy.
customer_reviews.author: jme66

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t use another brand
customer_reviews.text: Great dog food. Have been using this brand for my dogs for years.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Naser

customer_reviews.title: The ingredients are top of the line
customer_reviews.text: Quality!!!!!! My dogs love it. 5 lb Yorkie and a 12 lb silkie. I had been feeding them blue buffalo.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Gately

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are doing great on it. Stools are hard and only a few. Easy to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Joel chavez

customer_reviews.title: Best food I have ever given to my dog!! 5/5
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually do reviews but this product really deserves it. My dog had a gas problem and his poop was not firm at all so I found this brand in DogFoodAdvisor.com and decided to give it a try. After a couple of days of giving him this food, the gas problem disappear and his poops looks firm now, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mario Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Puppy and breeder approved!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this food. We even use it as training treats and she loves it. Our breeder also recommended this food. This is the type of food they used before we got our puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy M

customer_reviews.title: Dry Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. It does not make her itch like so many others.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra V

customer_reviews.title: It spoils quick
customer_reviews.text: About a week after we purchased the food my dog started having stomach trouble and we found out the bag was spoiled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogo Argentina loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great food gives good firm poops and dogo Argentina loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jetaime408

customer_reviews.title: Should recall  a batch
customer_reviews.text: We just received this food, and fed it to our puppy at least twice and realized the bag was full of worms. Our dog has had non stop diarrhea and we had to get him dewormer meds to hope it doesn't poison him. Contact amazon and the seller immediately if you have had this experience too.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthiacity

customer_reviews.title: Great for Labrador Retrievers
customer_reviews.text: Great high protein dog food. Victor foods are some of the best you can purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BB in the Mtns

customer_reviews.title: black diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: Mixed 1/4 cup of the Victor to 3/4 cup of the product used by the Kennel. The result was a disaster of diarrhea. Black color was attributable to the color of this product. Diarrhea? Probably just not tolerable by our new puppy. Too much of a mess to continue trying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Victors is the best
customer_reviews.text: My 9 week old Lab loves it . He previously ate diamond puppy food and always seemed hungry and now with less food each meal he seems much fuller throughout the day .
customer_reviews.author: Faith Rapier

customer_reviews.title: The best dog food!! 5-Stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: Dogfoodadvisor.com rates this food at 5-stars!! I completely agree! My 5 German Shepherd Dogs love their Victor Nutra Pro Dog Food!!
customer_reviews.author: J. H. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Best price with prime
customer_reviews.text: My GSP loves it. We are on our second bag with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rizor

customer_reviews.title: Uncertain about the food
customer_reviews.text: couldn't get my German Shepard to eat the Nutra Pro. I'm sure it is a great food product I just have a dog that is hard to please with any food. Right now I have about $100 worth of foods that we have tried but failed to please out dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Maybe Is not for small breeds
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, but my dog did not. I gave it to a friend and his dogs love it. Maybe is not for small breeds.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great food. English lab does amazing on it. Perfect coat and great weight gain without getting overweight
customer_reviews.author: Chris W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd puppy seems to like this kibble a lot. She is healthy, energetic and alert with a very good muscle definition and good coat. Color is the richest I have seen in any kibble.
customer_reviews.author: Debra F. Kalkstein

customer_reviews.title: Yum - we did our research and it Betty loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this stuff and is complimented on her coat by the vet and others often.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love this brand! Chewy was going to be at least a week because of Covid & Prime got it to me with 2 day shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Candelaria

customer_reviews.title: Gave my 2 pugs diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: Have 2 pugs. They been 💩 💩 all week. All over the house. I'm switching back to hills
customer_reviews.author: Anish Hartley

customer_reviews.title: I want to develop the product, I didn’t open it
customer_reviews.text: My dog stopped to eat Victor before I open the last package. I’d like to send you back the package. Please, send me instructions Tks
customer_reviews.author: alexander

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend !
customer_reviews.text: Top of the line kibble ! My pups love it and keep weight on amazingly well with it !
customer_reviews.author: Angel Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Best dogs food
customer_reviews.text: If you want to have healthy dogs I recommended this amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Tirado

customer_reviews.title: High quality food
customer_reviews.text: My dog's fur is shiny. My dog ​​is full of energy.
customer_reviews.author: Kobisoffer

product_meta.title: VICTOR Purpose - Nutra Pro, Dry Dog Food
product_meta.description:
Size:40 lb



VICTOR Nutra Pro is an excellent choice for dogs with moderate to high levels of daily activity. This high-protein, nutrient-dense recipe is specially formulated for growing puppies, pregnant and lactating females, and dogs with high physical demands. Nutra Pro has higher protein and lower carbohydrate levels compared to other VICTOR multigrain formulas.

VICTOR Nutra Pro for Dogs is formulated to meet the nutritional levels established by the AAFCO Dog Food Nutrient Profiles for All Life Stages, including growth of large size dogs (70 lb. or more as an adult).

CALORIE CONTENT (Calculated ME):

3774 kcal/kg; 401 kcal/cup 

GUARANTEED ANALYSIS: 

Crude Protein 38.0% Minimum, 
Crude Fat 18.0% Minimum, 
Crude Fiber 3.5% Maximum, 
Moisture 9.0% Maximum, 
Linoleic Acid (Omega 6) 2.5% Minimum, 
Linolenic Acid (Omega 3) 0.4% Minimum, 
DHA 0.1% Minimum, 
Zinc 150 mg/kg Minimum, 
Selenium 0.35 mg/kg Minimum, 
Vitamin E 150 IU/kg Minimum, 
L-Carnitine* 80 mg/kg Minimum, 
*Not recognized as an essential nutrient by the AAFCO Dog Food Nutrient Profiles

INGREDIENTS: 

 Chicken Meal, Blood Meal, Whole Grain Millet, Chicken Fat (preserved with mixed Tocopherols), Yeast Culture, Grain Sorghum, Menhaden Fish Meal (source of DHA-Docosahexaenoic Acid), Beef Meal, Dehydrated Alfalfa Meal, Pork Meal, Natural Flavor, Potassium Chloride, Carrot Powder, Tomato Pomace (source of Lycopene), Taurine, Salt, Choline Chloride, Dried Seaweed Meal, Zinc Methionine Complex, Vitamin E Supplement, Hydrolyzed Yeast, Iron Amino Acid Complex, Calcium Carbonate, Manganese Amino Acid Complex, Ferrous Sulfate, L-Carnitine, Selenium Yeast, Copper Sulfate, Niacin Supplement, Vitamin B12 Supplement, D-Calcium Pantothenate, Vitamin A Supplement, Thiamine Mononitrate, Biotin, Riboflavin Supplement, Calcium Iodate, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Vitamin D3 Supplement, Powdered Cellulose, Brewers Dried Yeast, Dried Enterococcus Faecium Fermentation Product, Dried Aspergillus Oryzae Fermentation Extract, Dried Trichoderma Longibrachiatum Fermentation Extract, Dried Bacillus Subtilis Fermentation Extract, Silicon Dioxide, Tetra Sodium Pyrophosphate, Vegetable Oil, Rosemary Extract, Green Tea Extract, Spearmint Extract, Lecithin, Fructooligosaccharide, Folic Acid, Yucca Schidigera Extract

FEEDING GUIDELINES: 

 Refer to Recommended Feeding Chart for Adult Dogs. 
Number of Cups Per Day (8 oz measuring cup) 

5 lbs. -------- ½ cup 
10 lbs. ------ ⅞ cup 
15 lbs. ------ 1⅛ cups 
20 lbs. ------ 1½ cups 
30 lbs. ------ 2 cups 
40 lbs. ------ 2½ cups 
60 lbs. ------ 3¼ cups 
80 lbs. ------ 4 cups 
100 lbs. ----- 4¾ cups
Increase feeding intake by 1/2 cup for every 20 lbs over 100 lbs

FEEDING PUPPIES:

Puppies will typically start nibbling moistened dog foods at 3 to 4 weeks of age. Feed as much as the puppy will eat in 20 minutes in 4 feeding intervals spaced throughout the day. May be mixed with water, broth or milk at a ratio of 3 parts food to 1 part liquid. To ensure product freshness, do not leave moistened food out for more than 30 minutes. Puppies will be weaned from milk by 3 weeks of age. Continue to feed up to 4 times per day. Within a few months, the puppies may be transitioned to a self-feeder. After age one, feed to maintain good body condition, using the feeding chart as a guide.

PREGNANCY AND NURSING:

Energy requirements continually change during stages of gestation and lactation and may require up to four times recommended levels of intake. Adjust amount of food provided to maintain good body condition of your female dog. 

TIPS ON TRANSITIONING TO VICTOR:

When changing from a different food to any VICTOR dog food formula, transition your dog to VICTOR over the course of one week to 10 days, gradually increasing the amount of VICTOR every few days. Keep fresh water available at all times.
feature_bullets: Our highest-protein, lowest carb multigrain formula for dogs of All Life Stages
Excellent for growing puppies and pregnant and lactating females. Also provides sustained energy for sporting dogs and dogs with high physical demands
Fortified with vitamins, minerals, essential fatty acids, protein and amino acids
Formulated with our scientifically advanced, proven VICTOR Core ingredients to promote healthy immune and digestive systems.
Ideal for dogs with allergies to other meat proteins. Made from gluten free grains.
